channel.title: Dark bow special[SOLVED]

item.title: Dark bow special[SOLVED]
item.dc:creator: @Phonicstudios Phonicstudios
item.description:
@Phonicstudios wrote:

Hello all, I got a question; I’m using Lost Legacy source, its a 474 with 525 graphics.
The darkbow special is very weird. Gfx is 672 when i shoot with D arrows i would like the dragon heads flying… not some kind of coal balls…

			case 11235: // dark bow	
			c.usingBow = true;
			c.dbowSpec = true;
			c.rangeItemUsed = c.playerEquipment[c.playerArrows];
			c.getItems().deleteArrow();
			c.getItems().deleteArrow();
			c.lastWeaponUsed = weapon;
			c.hitDelay = 3;
			c.startAnimation(426);
			c.projectileStage = 1;
			c.gfx100(getRangeStartGFX());
			c.hitDelay = getHitDelay(c.getItems().getItemName(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]).toLowerCase());
			if (c.fightMode == 2)
				c.attackTimer--;
			if (c.playerIndex > 0)
				fireProjectilePlayer();
			else if (c.npcIndex > 0)
				fireProjectileNpc();
			c.specAccuracy = 2.75;
			c.specDamage = 1.70;
			break;
		}

This is the special code… If you need more codes, just post. and please help me out.
pretty desperate…

edit: Solved.
